accelerator.name: Accelerator
accelerator.desc: The first card played in negotiation or battle gains +2 XP.

adhesive.name: Adhesive
adhesive.desc: At the start of each battle, choose a card in your hand and give it **Sticky**.

admiralty_medals.name: Admiralty Medals
admiralty_medals.desc: All friendly arguments gain 1 **Composure** at the start of your turn.

affiliation.name: Affiliation
affiliation.desc: At the start of each negotiation, gain 2 Vulnerability if your opponent is a Heshian.

anointed.name: Anointed
anointed.desc: At the start of every negotiation, gain 1 Wrath of Hesh.

authority.name: Authority
authority.desc: At the start of each negotiation, add a random authority card to your draw pile.

authorization.name: Authorization
authorization.desc: Once a day, you can ask a nearby member of the Admiralty to help you in battle or negotiation.

back_of_the_line.name: Back of the Line
back_of_the_line.desc: All items lose 1 use when added to your deck. (minimum of 1 use)

bad_credit.name: Bad Credit
bad_credit.desc: Buying anything from shopkeepers costs an additional 20 shills.

bad_faith.name: Bad Faith
bad_faith.desc: At the start of each fight, add a Gnarled Effigy to your draw pile.

bad_mouthed.name: Bad Mouthed
bad_mouthed.desc: At the start of every negotiation, insert 2 Fabrication cards into your draw pile.

bell_of_hesh.name: Bell of Hesh
bell_of_hesh.desc: Draw 1 extra card at the start of negotiation.

bio_feedback.name: Bio-Feedback
bio_feedback.desc: Status Cards cost 1 less action in battle.

blacklisted.name: Blacklisted
blacklisted.desc: At the start of each negotiation, discard a random card.

bog_sensitive.name: Bog Sensitive
bog_sensitive.desc: Whenever you draw a **Parasite** card in negotiation or battle, take 2 damage.

bogger_pauldrons.name: Bogger Pauldrons
bogger_pauldrons.desc: At the end of your turn, gain 1-3 **Defense**.

bogling.name: Bogling
bogling.desc: Whenever you draw a **Parasite** card in negotiation or battle, discard a random card from your hand.

boosted_cybernetics.name: Boosted Cybernetics
boosted_cybernetics.desc: Gain 3 Mending at the start of each battle.

brutality.name: Brutality
brutality.desc: Status cards cost 1 additional action in battle.

buried.name: Buried
buried.desc: At the start of each battle, gain 2 **Impair**.

butt_kicked.name: Butt Kicked
butt_kicked.desc: Whenever you draw an item card, your core argument takes 2 resolve damage.

capitalization.name: Capitalization
capitalization.desc: Your attacks deal 2 additional damage to targets affected by **Impair**.

celebrity.name: Celebrity
celebrity.desc: At the start of each negotiation, gain 3 Renown and 2 Influence.

celebrity_gossip.name: Celebrity Gossip
celebrity_gossip.desc: At the start of each day, a random person will hate you.

chieftain.name: Chieftain
chieftain.desc: All allied Spree gain 2 **Power** at the start of battle.

civil_unrest.name: Civil Unrest
civil_unrest.desc: All allies start battle with additional Panic.

commander.name: Commander
commander.desc: All allies gain +5 health in battle.

con_man.name: Con Man
con_man.desc: At the end of every negotiation, recover 3 Resolve.

concussed.name: Concussed
concussed.desc: If you draw more than 4 cards on your turn, your core argument takes 3 damage.

conditioning.name: Conditioning
conditioning.desc: At the start of each battle, gain 3 **Power**. Whenever you take damage from an enemy, lose 1 **Power**. You can only lose 3 total **Power** from this.

convenience.name: Convenience
convenience.desc: Fatigued occurs 1 turn later in both battle and negotiation.

covert_supplier.name: Covert Supplier
covert_supplier.desc: The first item card you play in each battle costs 1 less.

cozy.name: Cozy
cozy.desc: Gain 2 maximum resolve and 2 maximum health.

crisis.name: Crisis
crisis.desc: All allies gain a small amount of Panic at the start of your turn.

curse_of_hesh.name: Curse of Hesh
curse_of_hesh.desc: Lose 1 action and draw a card on your first turn of battle.

depleted.name: Depleted
depleted.desc: On your first turn of battle, draw one less card.

disapproval.name: Disapproval
disapproval.desc: At the start of any negotiation against a Pearlie or Heshian, gain 1 Flustered.

disorder.name: Disorder
disorder.desc: At the start of each battle, gain 4 Disrupt.

doze_bug.name: Doze Bug
doze_bug.desc: Whenever you sleep, increase your max health by 5.

drone_mastery.name: Drone Mastery
drone_mastery.desc: Allied mechs have 10 additional max Health.

drone_supplier.name: Drone Supplier
drone_supplier.desc: Combat Drone cards cost 1 additional action.

elitist.name: Elitist
elitist.desc: Feud Citizens that you meet for the first time will dislike you.

envoy_pendant.name: Envoy Pendant
envoy_pendant.desc: The first Diplomacy card you play each negotiation costs 1 less action.

excavator.name: Excavator
excavator.desc: The first item card you play in battle is played twice.

family_favor.name: Family Favor
family_favor.desc: At the start of each negotiation, gain 3 Renown.

fan_mail.name: Fan Mail
fan_mail.desc: At the start of each day receive 100 shills.

faulty_connections.name: Faulty Connections
faulty_connections.desc: All friendly arguments come into play with 1 less resolve.

first_aid.name: First Aid
first_aid.desc: Whenever you remove a debuff, **Heal** 5 health.

fragile_health.name: Fragile Health
fragile_health.desc: Whenever you gain a debuff, take 2 damage.

fumbling_fingers.name: Fumbling Fingers
fumbling_fingers.desc: Every 3rd turn in battle, discard a random card from your hand.

gear_head.name: Gear Head
gear_head.desc: **Heal** 1 health at the start of your turn if you took no damage last turn.

gluey_acquaintance.name: Gluey Acquaintance
gluey_acquaintance.desc: At the start of each battle, apply 1 Glued to all enemies.

grace_of_hesh.name: Grace of Hesh
grace_of_hesh.desc: **Heal** 3 health whenever you win a negotiation.

gremlins.name: Gremlins
gremlins.desc: At the end of your first turn each battle, take 2 damage per **Charge**.

grumpy_scowl.name: Grumpy Scowl
grumpy_scowl.desc: At the start of each negotiation, gain 2 Heated.

haggle_badge.name: Haggle Badge
haggle_badge.desc: You can negotiate for greater quest rewards.

hard_headed.name: Hard Headed
hard_headed.desc: Whenever you play a manipulate card, apply 1 **Composure** to a random friendly argument.

hard_knocks.name: Hard Knocks
hard_knocks.desc: After playing 10 cards, your next attack deals 8 bonus damage.

heathen.name: Heathen
heathen.desc: At the start of each negotiation, your opponent gains 1 Prayer of Hesh.

heavy_lifting.name: Heavy Lifting
heavy_lifting.desc: At the start of each battle, gain 4 **Defense** and 2 **Temporary Power**.

hemophiliac.name: Hemophiliac
hemophiliac.desc: **Bleed** cards deal 2 bonus damage to you.

heshian_obscenity.name: Heshian Obscenity
heshian_obscenity.desc: Your maximum hand size in negotiations is reduced by 2.

hunted.name: Hunted
hunted.desc: All enemy Admiralty gain 1 **Power** at the start of battle.

in_on_it.name: In On It
in_on_it.desc: At the start of each negotiation, gain 1 Interrogate.

inconvenience.name: Inconvenience
inconvenience.desc: Fatigued occurs 1 turn earlier in both battle and negotiation.

informant.name: Informant
informant.desc: At the start of every negotiation, incept 5 Planted Evidence for your opponent.

informed_enemies.name: Informed Enemies
informed_enemies.desc: Take 2 damage every time you play a card on the first turn of battle.

inoculated.name: Inoculated
inoculated.desc: Whenever you draw a **Parasite** card, heal 2 health or restore 2 resolve.

bully_bane.name: Bully
bully_bane.desc: Lose 1 **Defense** on all cards that apply **Defense**.

kill_list.name: Kill List
kill_list.desc: Enemy Spree gain 2 **Power** at the start of battle.

local_chatter.name: Local Chatter
local_chatter.desc: At the start of any negotiation against a Pearlie or Heshian, gain 3 Renown.

lowered_rank.name: Lowered Rank
lowered_rank.desc: Allies have 10% less max health in battle.

marked.name: Marked
marked.desc: Enemy Spree join battle with less Panic.

misinformation.name: Misinformation
misinformation.desc: Opponent arguments deal 2 bonus damage in negotiation.

mixology.name: Mixology
mixology.desc: Whenever you drink to restore resolve, also restore 4 health.

morale_boost.name: Morale Boost
morale_boost.desc: At the end of their turn, surrendered allies gain 10% of their maximum health.

on_the_list.name: On The List
on_the_list.desc: All friendly arguments come into play with 1 additional resolve.

ostracized.name: Ostracized
ostracized.desc: At the start of each negotiation, you gain 2 Vulnerability.

outwitted.name: Outwitted
outwitted.desc: Pin a random card at the start of battle.

people_person.name: People Person
people_person.desc: At the start of each negotiation, gain 2 Influence and 2 Dominance.

punchy.name: Punchy
punchy.desc: The first Maneuver card you play each fight is **Expended**.

puppeteer.name: Puppeteer
puppeteer.desc: Giving gifts to Heshians costs half as much.

quality_materials.name: Quality Materials
quality_materials.desc: Whenever you play an Item card, gain 2 **Defense**.

rattled.name: Rattled
rattled.desc: Enemy attacks against you deal 1 bonus damage if you have **Impair**.

red_tape.name: Red Tape
red_tape.desc: Members of the Admiralty will not help you in battle or negotiation.

regimented.name: Regimented
regimented.desc: All allied Spree have +10 Health in battle.

rentorian_battle_armor.name: Rentorian Battle Armor
rentorian_battle_armor.desc: Gain 3 **Power** at the start of each battle. Lose 3 **Power** the first time you take any damage.

scandal.name: Scandal
scandal.desc: At the beginning of every negotiation, lose 1 maximum resolve permanently.

scheme.name: Scheme
scheme.desc: At the start of every negotiation gain either 3 Influence or 3 Dominance. Chosen randomly.

scorned.name: Scorned
scorned.desc: The first Diplomacy card you play each negotiation costs 1 additional action.

sharpened_blades.name: Sharpened Blades
sharpened_blades.desc: All your attacks apply 2 **Bleed** on your first turn of battle.

shellshock.name: Shellshock
shellshock.desc: At the end of every turn, lose 2 **Defense**.

shunned.name: Shunned
shunned.desc: At the end of your first turn in negotiations, lose all Renown and Influence.

sketchy_equipment.name: Sketchy Equipment
sketchy_equipment.desc: Take 1 damage whenever you use an item.

slander.name: Slander
slander.desc: When you murder a member of the Rise, lose 2 max resolve.

spark_visor.name: Spark Visor
spark_visor.desc: At the start of battle, mark an enemy. Attacking that enemy grants you 8 **Defense**.

sparring.name: Sparring
sparring.desc: Gain 1 bonus **Defense** on all cards that apply **Defense**.

spiked_drink.name: Spiked Drink
spiked_drink.desc: Gain an Ulcer card whenever you drink.

steady_hands.name: Steady Hands
steady_hands.desc: Every 3rd turn in battle, draw 3 additional cards.

king_hit.name: King Hit
king_hit.desc: +4 Damage on the first attack in battle.

surprise_attack.name: Surprise Attack
surprise_attack.desc: Gain 1 action at the start of battle.

sway.name: Sway
sway.desc: At the start of any negotiation against Admiralty or Heshians, your opponent gains 1 Interrogate.

system_shock.name: System Shock
system_shock.desc: If you didn't attack last turn, gain 2 **Temporary Power**.

tainted_supply.name: Tainted Supply
tainted_supply.desc: Drinking adds an additional drunk card.

talisman.name: Talisman
talisman.desc: Whenever you draw a **Parasite** card, draw a card.

terrorized.name: Terrorized
terrorized.desc: When gained, 2 random Spree dislike you.

thin_skin.name: Thin Skin
thin_skin.desc: The first time you take damage each fight, gain 2 **Wound**.

throng.name: Throng
throng.desc: The first argument you create each negotiation has 2 bonus resolve.

top_shelf.name: Top Shelf
top_shelf.desc: Restore an additional 6 resolve when drinking.

torpor_fiend.name: Torpor Fiend
torpor_fiend.desc: When you sleep, gain full experience on a random card.

treachery.name: Treachery
treachery.desc: You can no longer gain any **Defense** on your first turn of battle.

troubled_past.name: Troubled Past
troubled_past.desc: Lose 2 maximum resolve and 2 maximum health.

undermined.name: Undermined
undermined.desc: At the start of each negotiation, gain 5 Planted Evidence.

voice_of_the_people.name: Voice of the People
voice_of_the_people.desc: Start all negotiations with a Voice of the People argument.

war_machine.name: War Machine
war_machine.desc: Receive a free RPG once a day from a member of the Rise.

watched.name: Watched
watched.desc: The first time you deploy an argument in each negotiation, it takes 1 damage.

weapons_expert.name: Weapons Expert
weapons_expert.desc: The first attack card you play each fight costs 0.

weapons_supplier.name: Weapons Supplier
weapons_supplier.desc: Receive a random item card every morning.

whispered_rumors.name: Whispered Rumors
whispered_rumors.desc: Opponents start with an additional argument each negotiation.

wrenched.name: Wrenched
wrenched.desc: The first card played every battle costs 1 additional action to play.

wrist_rocket.name: Wrist Rocket
wrist_rocket.desc: After your first attack each turn, deal 2 additional damage to your target.

wrong_papers.name: Wrong Papers
wrong_papers.desc: At the start of every negotiation, gain 2 Flustered.

wrong_side.name: Wrong Side
wrong_side.desc: At the start of each negotiation, gain 1 Doubt.
